list: This is a piece of map that you got from Wormbrain, the goblin thief. You will need to join it to the other two map pieces before you can see the route to Crandor.
This is a piece of map that you found Melzar's Maze. You will need to join it to the other two map pieces before you can see the route to Crandor.
This is a piece of map that you found in a secret chest in the Dwarven Mine. You will need to join it to the other two map pieces before you can see the route to Crandor.
You start the lengthy process of clambering into the pipe...
You push your body down further into the pipe...
A weird aroma strikes you and you stop temporarily... before getting back to it...
Some sort of liquid bursts down the pipe pushing you fast through the pipe, it tickles...
Finally, you see light from above, and start to climb upwards and out of the pipe system...
